original_title: Whisper in the sound of Silence
overview: “Whisper in the Sound of Silence” Is a slice of a contemporary woman’s life that begins her journey to find the meaning of love. As a woman in a society in transition from tradition to modernity in Iran is looking for love; a country that bans political, religious and economic have overshadowed on people’s lives.
title: Whisper in the sound of Silence
